name: clamav
tagline: An antivirus engine for detecting malware across servers and endpoints
description: ClamAV is an open-source antivirus engine designed for detecting malware, viruses, and threats. It can be used on mail servers, endpoints, and containerized environments, and offers a CLI scanner.

features.title: Antivirus Engine
features.description: Open-source malware and virus detection. Comprehensive protection

features.title: Mail Server Protection
features.description: Scan email attachments for threats. Secure communication

features.title: Cli Scanner
features.description: Command-line scanning for files and directories. Flexible usage

features.title: Regular Updates
features.description: Frequent virus definition updates. Current protection

features.title: Cross
features.description: Works on Linux, Windows, and macOS. Universal security

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Transparent, auditable security code. Trust through verification
